detail_desc: Short wrap dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, short sleeves and a seam at the waist with a tie belt. Frill-trimmed edge and hem on the skirt. Unlined.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Imitation leather trainers with snakeskin-patterned details, a lightly padded top edge and lacing at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Imitation leather trainers with snakeskin-patterned details, a lightly padded top edge and lacing at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a stand-up collar and a detachable hood with a print motif and appliqués. Zip down the front with a chin guard, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and elasticated cuffs. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a stand-up collar and a detachable hood with a print motif and appliqués. Zip down the front with a chin guard, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and elasticated cuffs. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a stand-up collar and a detachable hood with a print motif and appliqués. Zip down the front with a chin guard, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and elasticated cuffs. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Dungaree shorts in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with elastication at the back of the waist and straps that cross at the back and have adjustable fasteners at the front. Kangaroo pocket with a print motif and appliqués, press-studs at the crotch and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Set with a tube scarf and headband in jersey with soft fleece inside. Contrasting colour flatlock seams. Length of scarf 38 cm, circumference 56 cm.
Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a slight sheen. Detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with an imitation leather tab and a chin guard, and front pockets. Lined.
Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a slight sheen. Detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with an imitation leather tab and a chin guard, and front pockets. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a frill-trimmed yoke at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a frill-trimmed yoke at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Lightly padded, fleece-lined all-in-one suit with a lined hood, buttons at the top and concealed press-studs at the sides.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a jacket and pair of shorts woven in an airy linen blend. Jacket with notch lapels, buttons at the front, a chest pocket and welt side pockets with a flap. Shorts with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Detachable, elastic D-ring belt.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with an opening with lacing and lace embroidery at the back, and short sleeves with overlocked edges.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with an opening with lacing and lace embroidery at the back, and short sleeves with overlocked edges.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a detachable, lined hood in jersey, a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Decorative fabric appliqués, flap chest pockets with a button, and a gently rounded hem.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a viscose blend with a supersoft, brushed finish. Long raglan dolman sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and short slits in the sides.

Pyjamas in a printed viscose weave. Short-sleeved shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, slits in the sides and a slightly longer, rounded back. Short shorts with an elasticated waist.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of trousers in organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a sewn-on bow tie at the top, sewn-on waistcoat with decorative buttons down the front, and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and a gently rounded, slightly longer back. Shorts with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, fake front and back pockets, and a detachable D-ring belt.

5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and buttons, and skinny legs. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.

Set with a dungaree dress, short-sleeved top, pair of leggings and a hairband. Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with patch front pockets, straps with a decorative knot detail at the front, and press-studs at the back. Jersey top with butterfly sleeves and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Leggings in patterned jersey with an elasticated waist. Double-layered jersey hairband with a knot detail at the front.
